device.description: Which serial port will be used for serial communication

databits.description: Select how many bits will be used for character

stopbits.description: Select how many stop bits will be used to detect the end of character

parity.description: Select what kind of parity bit to use for error detection

flowcontrol.description: Select what kind of characters to use for flow control

protocol.description: Select which protocol to use for data transmission

raw.description: Enable to transmit all data transparently.

no_leading_zeros.description: Check this to skip hex first zeros.

port_connect.description: Specify port number for the connectivity establishment.

timeout.description: Disconnect client if connection is not active.

read_duration.description: Specifies the maximum milliseconds to wait for serial data

max_clients.description: Specify (1-32) how many clients are allowed to connect simultaneously

close_connections.description: Close TCP connections everytime data is sent or received (might result in serial data loss)

connect_on_data.description: Only attempt to connect to server when data is received from serial device

max_connection_attempts.description: Connection retry count before dropping serial data

address_connect.description: Specify server address and port for client to connect to. E.g 192.168.1.1:80.

recon_interval.description: Specify intervals connection to server if it fails.

keepalive_time.description: The interval between last data packet sent

keepalive_interval.description: The interval between subsequential keepalive probes

port_listen.description: Specify port number for server to listen.

cd_enable.description: Enable connection indication on CD pin.

dsr_enable.description: Enable connection indication on DSR pin.

cd_invert.description: Invert default CD pin level for indication.

dsr_invert.description: Invert default DSR pin level for indication.

predefined_address.description: Set predefined IP and port for UDP connection. E.g 192.168.1.1:80
